feed.title: BudgetBee Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for BudgetBee: v0.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • 67 and #70 - Migration to vite and development containers by @radguru in https://github.com/budgetbee/budgetbee/pull/72

  • Bump @adobe/css-tools from 4.3.1 to 4.3.2 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/budgetbee/budgetbee/pull/73
  • Open record form as a modal in desktop version by @Pelukosa in https://github.com/budgetbee/budgetbee/pull/74

Full Changelog: https://github.com/budgetbee/budgetbee/compare/v0.4.3...v0.5.0

entry.title: New release for BudgetBee: v0.5.1
entry.content:
In this version, the loading speed of the main dashboard has been improved by the use of cache

What's Changed

  • Improve dashboard request speed by @Pelukosa in https://github.com/budgetbee/budgetbee/pull/76

Full Changelog: https://github.com/budgetbee/budgetbee/compare/v0.5.0...v0.5.1

entry.title: New release for BudgetBee: v0.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump vite from 5.0.2 to 5.0.5 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/budgetbee/budgetbee/pull/77
  • 78 all desktop record form as modal by @Pelukosa in https://github.com/budgetbee/budgetbee/pull/79
  • Update js libraries
  • Minor visual improvements

Support

If the project is useful for you to manage your finances more efficiently, you can support the project and contribute to its growth.

Monthly donation via GitHub Sponsors Buy me a coffee here

Thank you very much for your support, it helps this project to be amazing.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/budgetbee/budgetbee/compare/v0.5.1...v0.6.0

entry.title: New release for BudgetBee: v0.7.0
entry.content:
Welcome to version v0.7.0

In this version a new element called "Budgets" has been introduced. This is a new tab to create monthly budgets for each category. At the moment it is something simple, but it serves as an idea so that in the future new functionalities can be added to it.

What's Changed

  • Update bug_report.md by @Pelukosa in https://github.com/budgetbee/budgetbee/pull/81
  • 84 add budgets by @Pelukosa in https://github.com/budgetbee/budgetbee/pull/89

Support

If the project is useful for you to manage your finances more efficiently, you can support the project and contribute to its growth.

üí∞Monthly donation via GitHub Sponsors ‚òïBuy me a coffee here

Thank you very much for your support, it helps this project to be amazing.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/budgetbee/budgetbee/compare/v0.6.0...v0.7.0

entry.title: New release for BudgetBee: v0.7.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

This time we have fixed a problem reported by several users when trying to run migrations from console using MariaDB as database container.

Thanks to @mariushosting for the report and support on his website. Don't forget to visit it, he regularly uploads self-hosted applications. Marius hosting web

  • üêõ Fix migration by @Pelukosa in https://github.com/budgetbee/budgetbee/pull/92

Support

If the project is useful for you to manage your finances more efficiently, you can support the project and contribute to its growth.
